price: Na naapa kwa mzazi na alicho kizaa.
footnotes: Na naapa kwa mzazi na anacho kizaa, na kwa hao wawili ndio jinsi inahifadhika na maendeleo yanabakia.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
